title: Default shader doesn't compile always
body:
The Benchmark3DTest and similar tests cause crash on my device. Here is the log:

```
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): FATAL EXCEPTION: GLThread 5519
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): com.badlogic.gdx.utils.GdxRuntimeException: Compile failed.
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 0:10: Syntax error, 'tangentFlag' macro redefinition
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 0:11: Syntax error, 'binormalFlag' macro redefinition
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 2 compilation errors. No code generated.
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): Compile failed.
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 0:10: Syntax error, 'tangentFlag' macro redefinition
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 0:11: Syntax error, 'binormalFlag' macro redefinition
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689): ERROR: 2 compilation errors. No code generated.
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.shaders.BaseShader.init(BaseShader.java:172)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.shaders.DefaultShader.init(DefaultShader.java:496)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.utils.BaseShaderProvider.getShader(BaseShaderProvider.java:35)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelBatch.render(ModelBatch.java:269)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelBatch.render(ModelBatch.java:280)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.tests.g3d.Benchmark3DTest.render(Benchmark3DTest.java:212)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.tests.g3d.BaseG3dTest.render(BaseG3dTest.java:99)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.tests.g3d.BaseG3dTest.render(BaseG3dTest.java:115)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.tests.g3d.BaseG3dHudTest.render(BaseG3dHudTest.java:153)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidGraphics.onDrawFrame(AndroidGraphics.java:416)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$GLThread.guardedRun(GLSurfaceView.java:1516)
10-03 16:00:21.324: E/AndroidRuntime(16689):    at android.opengl.GLSurfaceView$GLThread.run(GLSurfaceView.java:1240)

```
